net.sourceforge.seqware.common.util.filetools.lock

Class SimpleFileLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sourceforge.seqware.common.util.filetools.lock.SimpleFileLock
  • Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public class SimpleFileLock
extends Object
    Takes in a fileName String or File object that we want to create a lockfile for This object is no longer needed since LockingFileTools now uses standard Java locking mechanisms
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    jmendler

      • getLock

        public boolean getLock(boolean freeOnExit)
        Deprecated. 
        Lock file, but give option to free lock when the JVM exits. Avoids dead locks if lock holder fails.
        Parameters:
        freeOnExit - a boolean.
        Returns:
        a boolean.
